xwalk.crosslink
Class CrossLink

java.lang.Object
  structure.matter.Bond
      xwalk.crosslink.CrossLink

public class CrossLink
extends Bond

Class for representing Cross-Link objects.

0.1
Version:
0.1
Author:
Abdullah Kahraman

Constructor Detail

CrossLink

public CrossLink(Atom atom1,
                 Atom atom2)
Constructor.

Parameters:
atom1 - - First protein atom to be connected by the virtual cross-linker.
atom2 - - Second protein atom to be connected by the virtual cross-linker.

CrossLink

public CrossLink(Atom atom1,
                 Atom atom2,
                 int sequenceDistance,
                 double euclideanDistance)
Constructor. No Euclidean distance calculations are performed.

Parameters:
atom1 - - First protein atom to be connected by the virtual cross-linker.
atom2 - - Second protein atom to be connected by the virtual cross-linker.
euclideanDistance - - double value representing the Euclidean distance between both atoms.
sequenceDistance - - integer value representing the distance in sequence space of both atoms.
Method Detail

setSolventPathDistance

public final void setSolventPathDistance(double dist)
Sets the Solvent-Path distance. In order to calculate the Solvent-Path distance please see in the Class CrossLinkList.

Parameters:
dist - - Distance in the Solvent-Path space.

setPath

public final void setPath(Path path)
Sets the grid path of the Solvent-Path distance.

Parameters:
path - - Path object holding the list of GridCell object between source and target grid cells within a Grid object.

equalsInHomolog

public final boolean equalsInHomolog(CrossLink crossLink)
Checks whether a second cross-link has the same residue name and residue number.

Parameters:
crossLink - - CrossLink object to be compared to this CrossLink object.
Returns:
TRUE if both CrossLink object are equal in homology, FALSE otherwise.

equals

public final boolean equals(CrossLink crossLink)
Checks whether a second cross-link has the same atom identifier, i.e. residue name, residue number, chain Id and atom name.

Parameters:
crossLink - - CrossLink object to be compared to this CrossLink object.
Returns:
TRUE if both CrossLink object are equal in all atom identifier, FALSE otherwise.

setPeptides

public final boolean setPeptides(PolyPeptide prePeptide,
                                 PolyPeptide postPeptide)
Sets both peptide object that are interconnected by this cross-linker.

Parameters:
prePeptide - - PolyPeptide object of the preAtom.
postPeptide - - PolyPeptide object of the postAtom.
Returns:
TRUE if both peptides contain both cross-linked atoms, FALSE otherwise.
